content.p: The HR International Employment Services Team can be contacted for enquiries related to immigration and global mobility. Meet the team Financial support for visas and the immigration health surcharge Moving to Nottingham We work closely with other University departments to ensure that the risk and compliance considerations associated with international working are addressed, to develop policies and process improvements in response to legislative or political changes and in support of the Universityâ€™s evolving strategy and business needs, at all three campuses.
